channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
Can someone help me with this damage? I've fixed it for melee, and range. But, I can't find where to fix the things for mage. Barrage hits 55 max. :l
I want to change the damage that it does. Is there a keyword I can search for to change this damage?
Please help. :l[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 12:15:44 pm[/size][hr]Anyone, please?

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Thanks for you help, I’m going to try this when I get home, and I’ll post the results.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 03:53:43 pm[/size][hr]hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25)

So, the 5 is the LOWEST the spell can hit, and the i[/i] is the HIGHEST it can hit? Right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 03:54:38 pm[/size][hr]And I do hope, you know, I’m talking about ice barrage. :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 04:39:59 pm[/size][hr]Guys, you do know that I’m talking about ice barrage? So you don’t get confused with the ID’s and stuff. Are them the same ID’s as ice barrage? Or a different kind of barrage?

Also, how can you change the delay of the ice barrage? Like, so you can time it. It takes forever to be able to do it again, is their a way to change that? If so, where at, and what is the keyword that I’m looking for.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

I think that he means the magic ID would be different? If yours don’t work, try his…? :l

I have to wait to get home, to test it out.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 03:47:38 pm[/size][hr]Also, Client class. Means Client.java right?

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

kickingjamie:

search for if (magicID == 12891) in client class. find this part: hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); 5 is the lowest hit and 25 is the highest mess around with them.

Alright, cool man, thanks. What does the guy mean by the ID’s might be different? They should be the same for everyone?

And thanks guys, I really respect you guys helping me.

Read full topic

^^^^ Post above is correct just mine is 12862 so if it doesnt work try that number
